sentence: He can largely ruin a Republican's standing within his or her own party just ask Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois.
author: Kimberly Leonard
title: A Trump-free 2024 race would trigger Republican chaos: 'Everybody is running.'

sentence: There's one person in particular that I can think of that has their own lane and has said that they will not support Trump in 2024, and that's Liz Cheney,? he added.
author: Brett Samuels
title: Barr becomes latest former ally to escalate feud with Trump

sentence: Somebody such as Larry Hogan or Liz Cheney might enter the race and face the same problem.
author: Dan McLaughlin
title: Is Mike Pence Preparing a Kamikaze Campaign?

sentence: Christie responded: "Whatever it is, it wasn't like she was looking to protect her position, and the first time that Republicans inside that caucus had a chance to vote on Liz Cheney they voted the keep her overwhelmingly."
author: John L. Dorman
title: Chris Christie says Liz Cheney 'wanted to be kicked out' of House Republican leadership

sentence: Host Jonathan Karl offered that Cheney "says the point she's making is to defend the Constitution of the United States," prompting Christie to respond "look, whatever it is, it wasn't like she was looking to protect her position and the first time that Republicans inside that caucus had a chance to vote on Liz Cheney, they voted to keep her, overwhelmingly."
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Chris Christie Has a Theory About Liz Cheney

sentence: That group, united by criticism of Trump and their ties to traditional Republican politics, includes New Hampshire Governor Chris Sununu and Wyoming Congresswoman Liz Cheney, who is vice chair of the House select committee investigating the attack on the Capitol.
author: Robert Costa
title: Hogan says Trump should not run in 2024 and GOP should "move on," resist "cheap impersonation"
